```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r cars}
summary(mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars
```

```{r}
LinearReg <- lm(hp ~ qsec, data = mtcars)
```

```{r}
summary(LinearReg)
```

```{r}
plot(hp ~ qsec, data = mtcars, col=2)
abline(LinearReg,col=3,lwd=2)
bs <- round(coef(LinearReg), 3) 
lmlab <- paste0("hp = ", bs[1],
             ifelse(sign(bs[2])==1, " + ", " - "), abs(bs[2]), " qsec ")
mtext(lmlab, 3, line=-2)
```
